last_episode_to_air.name: Bye Bye Bunker
last_episode_to_air.overview: Branch throws a party in his bunker â€¦ for better or worse.

name: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
overview: Queen Poppy tries to keep Troll Village's peace with the Bergens by inviting them to parties, playing their sports and preventing crime.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: As Queen Poppy welcomes a new time of peace in Troll Village with parties, sports games and holiday celebrations, Branch tries to be more fun-loving.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: As Poppy learns how to carry out her duties as queen, the village celebrates the arrival of new characters, critters and holidays.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: As the trolls turn a new enemy into a friend, Poppy trains Branch in "hair-jitsu," Smidge woos a crush and DJ Suki throws the best party ever.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: With her sunny attitude, Poppy leads her friends in rescuing Mr. Dinkles, supporting Guy Diamond's new invention and teaching Smidge to be helpful.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: This season, the trolls get lost in wormholes, journey to the Fountain of Glitter, go for a ride in a submarine, play in the snow and more.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: The trolls face a day without a holiday, Biggie accidentally starts a fun-tastic new dance craze, and Guy turns a camping trip into a "glamping" trip.

episodes.name: A New Bergen-ing
episodes.overview: Poppy invites the Bergens to a party, much to the trolls' horror.

episodes.name: Laugh Out Cloud
episodes.overview: Cloud Guy offers Branch to be his best friend for a day.

episodes.name: Two Party System
episodes.overview: Poppy reveals that Branch and Bridget both have the same birthday.

episodes.name: Fun Branch
episodes.overview: Branch invites the Snack Pack into his bunker.

episodes.name: Royal Review
episodes.overview: A nervous Poppy awaits for her performance as queen.

episodes.name: Funishment
episodes.overview: Poppy becomes a detective when a Bergen's pie is stolen.

episodes.name: Bad News Bergens
episodes.overview: Poppy signs the trolls up for Bergenball.

episodes.name: Unhealthy Competition
episodes.overview: Smidge's stoutberry juice and Guy Diamond's Glitterade are rivaled.

episodes.name: Cloudy with a Chance of Hugs
episodes.overview: Cloud Guy offers Branch help on Hug Day.

episodes.name: Creek Week
episodes.overview: Creek's return from Trolls (2016) is featured.

episodes.name: The Giver
episodes.overview: Poppy must figure out who left some gifts every harvest moon.

episodes.name: Bellow Bug Day
episodes.overview: Things go from bad to worse when Poppy tries to fix a holiday.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: As Queen Poppy welcomes a new time of peace in Troll Village with parties, sports games and holiday celebrations, Branch tries to be more fun-loving.

episodes.name: Prank Day
episodes.overview: On Prank Day, Branch and Poppy try to out-trick each other to earn the title of Prank Master.

episodes.name: Adventures in Dinkles-Sitting
episodes.overview: While baby-sitting Mr. Dinkles, Branch runs into trouble.

episodes.name: Eye'll Be Watching You
episodes.overview: After Poppy crashes her flyer, Branch brings a safety monitor to the village.

episodes.name: Sorry Not Sorry
episodes.overview: When Gristle upsets Bridge, Poppy teaches him how to apologize.

episodes.name: Big Poppy
episodes.overview: In a compliment rap battle, Poppy tries to dethrone reigning champ Master Control.

episodes.name: Neighbor War
episodes.overview: Branch's plan to drive away new neighbor Sky Toronto backfires.

episodes.name: Remote Out of Control
episodes.overview: Smidge, Guy, Cooper and Biggie take Branchâ€™s remote control, Gary, for a joyride.

episodes.name: Critter Comfort
episodes.overview: Poppy's attempt to help a herd of Swampkins does just the opposite.

episodes.name: The Poppy Horror Picture Show
episodes.overview: When a scary story makes Biggie go into hiding, Poppy devises a plan to help him.

episodes.name: Dinkles Dinkles Little Star
episodes.overview: Biggie hires a confidence coach to prep Mr. Dinkles for a pet show.

episodes.name: The Party Games
episodes.overview: A new Party Games contestant could upstage Guy.

episodes.name: Trolly Tales
episodes.overview: To entertain the kids on their first trip to the library, Poppy and Branch retell some classic tales.

episodes.name: Model Behavior
episodes.overview: Satin and Chenilleâ€‹ put on a fashion show to impress a trendsetter.

episodes.name: Pillow War
episodes.overview: The village holds a pillow fight to see who will win the comfy Pillow of Destiny.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: As Poppy learns how to carry out her duties as queen, the village celebrates the arrival of new characters, critters and holidays.

episodes.name: The Imposter
episodes.overview: Branch and Poppy hunt for an imposter in Troll Village.

episodes.name: The Frenemy
episodes.overview: Poppy discovers the master of disguise belongs to an evil group called the Party Crashers.

episodes.name: Hair-Jitsu
episodes.overview: Branch learns the importance of patience when Poppy teaches him "hair-jitsu."

episodes.name: Crushin' It
episodes.overview: Smidge's crush on a critter-narian leads her to tone down her Smidge-ness.

episodes.name: Meet the Peppy
episodes.overview: To impress King Peppy during a Swag Stag hunt, Branch invents a tall tale he has to keep up with.

episodes.name: Party Crash Course
episodes.overview: DJ Suki takes Poppy's crash course in party hosting.

episodes.name: Trolly Tales 2
episodes.overview: The Trolls try to entertain Archer Pastry with a series of Troll stories.

episodes.name: Rainbowmageddon
episodes.overview: Cloud Guy offers to fix a local rainbow in urgent need of repair.

episodes.name: Coop, Where's My Guy?
episodes.overview: When Cooper loses Guy Diamond in a forest, Poppy and Branch help retrace his steps.

episodes.name: Fluffleberry Quest
episodes.overview: Poppy vows to re-create Branch's favorite dessert -- at any cost.

episodes.name: FOMO-OPUP
episodes.overview: Guy Diamond enlists the Snack Pack to hunt down Nova Swift's next pop-up party.

episodes.name: Lost in the Woods
episodes.overview: Lost in Troll Forest, Poppy and Archer must learn to trust each other.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: As the trolls turn a new enemy into a friend, Poppy trains Branch in "hair-jitsu," Smidge woos a crush and DJ Suki throws the best party ever.

episodes.name: Party Crashed
episodes.overview: When outsiders invade Troll Village and take Mr. Dinkles hostage, the trolls must win a sing-off in order to get him back.

episodes.name: Weekend at Diamond's
episodes.overview: Poppy and Branch must help a sleepy Guy Diamond pitch his new invention to Sky Toronto.

episodes.name: Branchception
episodes.overview: Branch gets trapped in a dream in which everyone worships him.

episodes.name: The Bunker List
episodes.overview: Branch tries to complete all the items on his "Bunker List" in one day.

episodes.name: The Interns
episodes.overview: Interns Satin and Chenille must save boss Nova Swift from a fashion disaster.

episodes.name: Three Trolls-keteers
episodes.overview: Guy Diamond mistakes a plea for help for an invitation to perform the trolls' new play.

episodes.name: The Helper
episodes.overview: Smidge is eager to prove how helpful she can be.

episodes.name: Smidgician
episodes.overview: When the trolls secretly help Smidge with her magic show, she thinks her powers are real.

episodes.name: DJ's Got Talent
episodes.overview: DJ Suki tries to impress her niece during Talent Week.

episodes.name: Peril Patch
episodes.overview: A strange new mini-golf course fuels competition between Poppy and Branch.

episodes.name: Sibling Quibbling
episodes.overview: To Chenille's dismay, Satin befriends a troll who loves extreme sports.

episodes.name: Musical Thrones
episodes.overview: The Musical Thrones Tournament tests Smidge and Biggie's longtime alliance.

episodes.name: Branch Bum
episodes.overview: An accident that lands the Snack Pack on a desert island transforms Branch.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: With her sunny attitude, Poppy leads her friends in rescuing Mr. Dinkles, supporting Guy Diamond's new invention and teaching Smidge to be helpful.

episodes.name: Wormhole
episodes.overview: The trolls get lost in a series of wormholes, each leading to an alternate world.

episodes.name: Ear Worm
episodes.overview: DJ Suki unveils a new song that proves to be a little too catchy.

episodes.name: Don't Worry Be Peppy
episodes.overview: To make her dad feel useful again, Poppy asks her friends to bring him small problems to solve.

episodes.name: Two's a Cloud
episodes.overview: Branch gets an unwanted roommate: Cloud Guy.

episodes.name: Glitter Loss
episodes.overview: When Guy Diamond loses his glitter, he embarks on a quest to get it back.

episodes.name: New Anthem
episodes.overview: Poppy creates a song contest to see who can write the best new troll anthem.

episodes.name: Dark Side of the Lagoon
episodes.overview: The Snack Pack go on a submarine ride to retrieve a lost item.

episodes.name: Mr. Glittercakes
episodes.overview: Poppy doubts Branch when he says he can't go to a party because of plans with a friend.

episodes.name: Snow Day
episodes.overview: The trolls make the most of the one day each year when it snows in the village.

episodes.name: Guy Misses Out
episodes.overview: Guy Diamond tries to understand an inside joke he missed out on.

episodes.name: Scrap to the Future
episodes.overview: Poppy finds a scrapbook that seems to predict the future.

episodes.name: Bringing Up Birdy
episodes.overview: Branch must overcome his bird fears when a nest of hatchlings confuse him for their parent.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: This season, the trolls get lost in wormholes, journey to the Fountain of Glitter, go for a ride in a submarine, play in the snow and more.

episodes.name: Blank Day
episodes.overview: Poppy must choose a new holiday for the one free day on the troll calendar.

episodes.name: Haircuffed
episodes.overview: To teach Creek and Branch to get along, Poppy ties their hair together.

episodes.name: Marshtato Fairy
episodes.overview: Branch sets out to prove to Poppy that the treat-delivering Marshtato Fairy doesn't really exist.

episodes.name: Do the Biggie
episodes.overview: Biggie accidentally invents a dance craze.

episodes.name: Hitting the Sky Note
episodes.overview: When Poppy discovers that Sky Toronto doesnâ€™t sing, she tries to convince him to give it a try.

episodes.name: Hug Fest
episodes.overview: At his first Hug Fest, Branch gets a tour from Poppy.

episodes.name: Chummy Sparklestone
episodes.overview: At a mystery party, Cooper falls in love with playing detective.

episodes.name: Giggleyum
episodes.overview: When a favorite frosting flavor is discontinued, Poppy tries to create a substitute.

episodes.name: Glamping
episodes.overview: The troll kids decide they prefer "glamping" with Guy over roughing it with Branch.

episodes.name: A Flower for Poppy
episodes.overview: The Snack Pack search for a rare flower for Poppy's half-birthday.

episodes.name: The Partier's Apprentice
episodes.overview: Exhausted from being the life of every party, Guy trains an apprentice.

episodes.name: Hair Ball
episodes.overview: Smidge accidentally agrees to go with both Milton and Guy to the Hair Ball.

6.name: Season 6
6.overview: The trolls face a day without a holiday, Biggie accidentally starts a fun-tastic new dance craze, and Guy turns a camping trip into a "glamping" trip.

episodes.name: Freeze Tag
episodes.overview: Poppy and Branch team up to sleuth out a playful mystery sweeping through Troll Village

episodes.name: Whimsy Wasps
episodes.overview: A fleet of unusual guests crash a whimsical dance party.

episodes.name: The Fast And The Friendliest
episodes.overview: Branch adopts a new attitude as the trolls prepare for the Junior Flyer Grand Prix.

episodes.name: Much Achoo About Nothing
episodes.overview: Mr. Dinkles faces a curious case of the sniffles.

episodes.name: Extreme Sleepover Club
episodes.overview: Smidge and Guy make a secret plan for some late-night fun.

episodes.name: Vega Swift
episodes.overview: Satin and Chenille take their "twintern" duties to the next level with a new rising star.

episodes.name: Scrapbookmobile
episodes.overview: Poppy gets crafty with a new way to share beloved stories.

episodes.name: Troll Rangers
episodes.overview: CJ powers through a day of junior ranger activities -- and learns a major lesson.

episodes.name: Doc Doc, Who's There?
episodes.overview: Dr. Moonbloom explores a crash course in silly fun

episodes.name: Tour Guide of Duty
episodes.overview: At the Volunteer Draft, Branch aims to redefine his grumpy reputation.

episodes.name: Troll Playing Game
episodes.overview: Poppy learns the ropes of Cupcakes & Caverns, a thrilling fantasy game.

episodes.name: Finn Cascade
episodes.overview: Branch tries to forge a friendship with a legendary visitor.

episodes.name: Gem Day
episodes.overview: Branch celebrates a milestone -- with a few unexpected surprises.

episodes.name: Bad Luck Branch
episodes.overview: The Bumper Bullseye Ball Championship begins! But will bad luck steal the spotlight?

episodes.name: Queen of the Castle
episodes.overview: Poppy works with some selfish shellfish for a special surprise.

episodes.name: Truth or Dare
episodes.overview: Biggie makes a bold move during a game of Truth or Dare.

episodes.name: Friend Matching
episodes.overview: Guy Diamond and Sky Toronto face off (and song off) after Poppy attempts to forge a friendship.

episodes.name: Trolly Tales 3
episodes.overview: A bad hair day ends in a storytelling adventure.

episodes.name: Apple of My Ire
episodes.overview: Cloud Guy is up to no good again! Will Branch push back on his pesky pranks?

episodes.name: Funsgiving
episodes.overview: Troll Village celebrates a silly and scrumptious holiday.

episodes.name: Bunker Break-In
episodes.overview: Branch and Poppy get creative for a gripping game of capture the flag.

episodes.name: To Catch a Critter
episodes.overview: Smidge scrambles to save an ultra-sweet picnic with Milton.

episodes.name: CJ's Wooferbug
episodes.overview: DJ Suki and Poppy prepare for CJ's Birthday with no help from a stubborn wooferbug.

episodes.name: What Did I Miss?
episodes.overview: Poppy shares a scrapbook of the day's events with King Peppy.

episodes.name: Tall Tail
episodes.overview: A fondue mishap lands Creek in hot water with Branch.

episodes.name: BFFF
episodes.overview: The Trolls team up to build a time capsule for Trolls of the future. But what will go inside?

episodes.name: Switcher-Ruby
episodes.overview: Magic and mayhem collide when Poppy and Branch make a switch with a special gem stone.

episodes.name: Bye Bye Bunker
episodes.overview: Branch throws a party in his bunker â€¦ for better or worse.
